charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard Grant and his
Amaura were heading up to the mountains,
so [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] decided to head that way as well.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1101_0200:
Upon arriving, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] spotted the pair of them
gazing up at some tall cliffs.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_0300:
Well now... Look who we have here.
What brings you up here to the mountains
today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0301_0400: I was actually looking for you.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_0500: Oh? Did you follow me up here?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0302_0600: I was curious what you were doing.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_0700: Oh? Did you follow me up here?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_0800:
Well, sorry to disappoint you, but we just
came to scope out the area today in
preparation for the real climb.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_0900:
We’re practicing so that one day, Amaura and
I can conquer this mountain together.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_1100:
Of course it is! That’s why we make sure
we take every safety precaution possible.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_1200:
Don’t worry—we’ll still be extremely cautious.
After all, mountain climbing is never 100 percent
safe, no matter how well prepared you are.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_1400:
Thank you! I’d love to ask you to join us
on the climb...
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_1500: but it can actually be quite dangerous.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_1600:
It’s important to be vigilant, no matter how
many safety precautions you’ve taken.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_1700:
I came to compete in the PML in order to
reach greater heights as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_1800:
But that’s not the only reason I decided to
come here to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_1900:
This is an artificial island... That means
someone had to create all of this beautiful,
majestic nature.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_2000:
I knew that climbing the mountains here
would be unlike anything I’ve ever done before!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_2100:
Ahh, I’m getting excited just thinking about it...
I can’t wait to start climbing.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0301_2200: Is there something at the very top?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0302_2400: Do you get a prize for doing it?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_2600:
Just a wide, open view of the
landscape below.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_2800:
Well, when I see a wall in front of me,
I’ve just got to climb it.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_3000: Well, what if I told you it’s a lot of fun for me?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_3100:
Pokémon battling and rock-climbing are really
different, but they have a lot in common, too.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_3200:
They can both feel like a wall in front of you.
You just have to climb over that wall and
keep aiming higher and higher.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_3300:
Wouldn’t you agree? I feel like the whole
process is really important.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_3500:
When it comes to Pokémon battling,
you and I are a lot alike.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_3600:
The look of enjoyment on our faces is as
plain as day, even when we’re up against
a tough opponent.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_3800:
Really? But I thought you were like me when
it comes to tackling challenges...pushing
yourself hard, past your limits, sometimes.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_3900:
Oh! Did you hear Amaura make that sound
just now? Maybe we’ll get to see it tonight.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4000:
Legends say that the cry of an Amaura is a
sign that an aurora will appear in the sky.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4100: I’ve never actually seen one myself, though.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4200:
Wouldn’t it be amazing if Amaura and I climbed
to the top of this treacherous mountain to
witness that beautiful aurora together?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4300:
Knowing there may be a special reward like
that at the top makes me want to go for it
even more!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4500:
I don’t know if he understands me or not...
I think whether we decide to go up
will depend on how Amaura feels.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4700:
Rock-climbing is my own challenge to myself,
but Pokémon battling can be something we
strive to conquer together.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4800:
Overcoming a tough battle is like climbing a
giant wall—there’s beauty on the other side
that you won’t find anywhere else...
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4900: That’s how I like to look at it, anyway.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_1201_0100:
As a Pokémon Trainer, I’ve always wondered
what a serious battle with you would be
like, Grant.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_1201_0200:
What a coincidence. I’ve often wondered the same
about you. If you’re half as strong as your cooking
is delicious, then it should be an amazing battle!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_1201_0300:
As a chef, I have a duty to make sure all who
come to me leave satisfied.
I shall face you with everything I have!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_0101_0100:
And if you win, I will treat you to one of my
special-made desserts!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_0501_0100:
That was a fantastic battle!
Very well. I promised you a dessert, didn’t I?
Please, come with me.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_0501_0200:
All right! I can’t wait! Hm?
Are you looking forward for dessert, too, Amaura?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_0501_0300:
No, I don’t think that’s the case.
I think he’s about to evolve!
Talk about the spice of life!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_0501_0400: It looks like you overcame another wall.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_0501_0500:
You’re the best, partner!
Let’s aim for even higher summits!
